name: part_002
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the song 'Ahoy!! Warera Houshou Kaizokudan☆' followed by a short instrumental dance break on the beach.
A transition rap segment where Marine and Fubuki perform a short intro leading into the next section.
Display of the 'Houshou Marine Birthday Live 2021' title card with announcements.

subtitles.original: Very Happy な人生を！ Yeah!
あー、むいて、ねむい。ずっとベッド出たくない。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm peeling and sleepy. I never want to leave my bed.

subtitles.original: ねむ、無駄じゃない？今日は休みなんです。すいまぱい！
subtitles.english: Sleepy... isn't it a waste? Today is my day off. Sorry-pi!

subtitles.original: セッション、ときはセッション。何かやりたいことやってみよう！
subtitles.english: Session, when it's a session... Let's try doing something we want to do!

subtitles.original: セッション、としてこう。君の内に秘めた欲望、オー！
subtitles.english: Let's keep it a session. The desire hidden within you, oh!

subtitles.original:
宝鐘マリン 生誕祭ライブ
重大発表あり！ゲスト多数！
subtitles.english:
Houshou Marine Birthday Live
Major announcement! Many guests!
